title: materialDefinition
description: Materials describe how a Feature or a set of Features is to be rendered, including shading and color. The following table provides the set of attributes and parameters for the 'type': 'standard' material.

name.description: A name for the material as assigned in the creating application.

type.description: Indicates the material type, chosen from the supported values.

$ref.description: The href that resolves to the shared resource bundle in which the material definition is contained.
